text: :Pages appear in :Category:German scientists This is a list of German scientists. *Fritz Müller (d. 1897), known for Müllerian mimicry; Evolutionary biology *Alexander von Humboldt (d. 1859), geographer, botanist *Alfred Wegener (d. 1930), known for his theory of continental drift *Max Planck (d. 1947), physicist *Martin Heidegger (d. 1976), philosopher *Tadzio Müller (born 1976), political scientist, climate and LGBT activist *Akuma Saningong, molecular biotechnologist * German scientists
title: List of German scientists
